messages.title: From Broxtowe, For Broxtowe
messages.content: Let's build a country where we invest our wealth to give everyone the best chance. Building the homes Broxtowe needs to rent and buy, keeping our communities safe with more police officers, giving our children's schools the funding they deserve and restoring the NHS to its place as the envy of the world. For the many, not the few. Join us.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Building the homes Broxtowe needs to rent and buy.
Keeping our communities safe with more police officers.
Giving our children's schools the funding they deserve.
Restoring the NHS to its place as the envy of the world.

quotes.text: Let's build a country where we invest our wealth to give everyone the best chance. Building the homes Broxtowe needs to rent and buy, keeping our communities safe with more police officers, giving our children's schools the funding they deserve and restoring the NHS to its place as the envy of the world. For the many, not the few. Join us.

images.caption: Greg Marshall and your local Labour Team called today
